titles.title: Have You Heard Him, Seen Him, Known Him

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
v2
v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}What has stripped the seeming beauty From these idols of the earth? Not a sense of right or duty, But the sight of peerless worth.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}So the crushing of these idols Was accomplished from the start By the beaming of His beauty The unveiling of His heart.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}It’s the look that melted Peter It’s the face that Stephen saw It’s the heart that wept with Mary Can alone from idols draw.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Draw and win and fill completely Till the cup o’erflows the brim. What have we to do with idols Who have fellowshipped with Him?{/lang-eng}
